group_1.textRight: Go, go, Ho-mu-ra!
Let's go! Fight! Win!@Let's go! Fight! Win!
Homuraaah! Homuraaah!@Go! Fight! Win!
Looook!@You got so many!
Your hit rate is way up!

group_1.textLeft: I'm getting better...@And it's all because of you, Natsuki!
I got so much better, so quickly...
There's no way I could have improved@that much, that fast, on my own.

group_1.textRight: Okey doke!@It's time for your break, Homura!
I'll set up the cans while you take a break.
Oh, I brought drinks by the way.@Have which ever one you like.

group_1.textLeft: Th-thank you!@You really are too kind...

group_1.textRight: No big, no big!@I'm curious, [chara:300200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]though...
Before, you made it sound kinda @like you always practice by yourself...
Don't you have any Magical Girl friends@to practice with?
No, no way!@If it's a problem for you...
Then it's my problem too!@I said I was here to support you, didn't I?

group_1.textLeft: ...@[freeze:0.4][chara:200300:motion_1:lipSynch_1]I do have a friend who uses guns.
But Mami... She's a veteran fighter.@There's way too wide a gap in experience.
If I asked her for special training it would@be like...pestering her, or something...

group_1.textRight: She's your friend though, isn't she?
Would one of your friends...
...be the kind of person to get annoyed@by you working hard to get better?
...Yeah, you're right.
She's your friend, Homura!
Let's ask her for help, okay?@She can be your shooting practice coach.

group_1.narration: I called Mami immediately and asked@her for her help with my shooting.
She promised to show@up to help straight away.

group_1.textRight: Whoa, she's coming now?!@So like, [chara:300200:motion_400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]NOW now?!

group_1.textLeft: She said she was already on her way.@To, "Just wait where you are!"

group_1.textRight: Geeeeeeze...!@[chara:300200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]She's a SUPER good friend, then!

group_1.textLeft: Wait... That means she'll be here @at any moment. Oh, I'm not ready!

group_1.textRight: Relax, relax.@[chara:300200:motion_1:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I'm not done cheering for you, yet!

group_1.narration: After an hour or so, Mami did@show up at the abandoned building.

group_1.textRight: Really, don't mention it.
I'm really impressed, Homura.@You were practicing by yourself?
Next time don't wait to ask me for help.@I'm here for you whenever.

group_1.textLeft: Oof!@Sorry, but she wasn't by herself today!
I was here too! The name's@Natsuki Utsuho, [chara:300200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Magical Girl cheerleader!

group_1.textRight: Cheerleader? I see.@[chara:200500:motion_100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Thank you for helping her.
I'm Mami Tomoe.@It's a pleasure to meet you.

group_1.textLeft: Great to meet you too!@Call on me for all your cheerleading needs!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* If I ever have any, [chara:200500:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]I will @make sure to come straight to you.

group_1.textLeft: Please do! I'm open for business 24/7!@365 days a year, [chara:300200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]absolutely no vacations!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@I will keep that in mind.
By the way...@Homura, how are you feeling?

group_1.textLeft: She's getting better at an incredible rate!@[chara:300200:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]She's gotten much better just today!

group_1.textRight: In that case...@We'd best move on to battle practice.
Battle with me, Homura!
